## Collection

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
load("ThesisP_dataset.RData")
kbl(JazzMusiciansData[c(178,90,1:6),],align = "l", row.names = T) %>%
  kable_paper("striped", full_width = F) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = T, font_size = 24)%>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T, font_size = 18)%>%
  kable_material_dark()
rm(list = ls())
```
